share_info.tips: #APEC重要讲话#的相关内容，来智搜看看

response.share_text: #APEC重要讲话#的相关内容，来智搜看看
response.msg:
我看到了一个关于“apec重要讲话”的搜索查询，需要整理出相关内容。今天是2025年10月31日，所以最新的APEC会议就是现在正在韩国庆州举行的第三十二次领导人非正式会议。

在这些搜索结果中，很多权威媒体账号如央视新闻、人民日报、新华社都报道了习近平主席今天（10月31日）在会议上的重要讲话。讲话标题是《共建普惠包容的开放型亚太经济》，这是非常核心的内容。

习近平主席在讲话中提出了5点重要建议：一是共同维护多边贸易体制；二是共同营造开放型区域经济环境；三是共同维护产业链供应链稳定畅通；四是共同推进贸易数字化绿色化；五是共同促进普惠包容发展。这些在多个搜索结果中都有详细说明。

特别值得注意的是，习近平主席在讲话中使用了生动的比喻，如“拉手而不是松手”、“延链而不是断链”，强调要加强合作而非割裂。

关于中国对外开放的成就，习近平提到过去5年中国货物和服务贸易规模位居全球第一和第二，累计吸引外资逾7000亿美元。他还宣布中国已给予最不发达国家100%税目产品零关税待遇，并愿对非洲建交国实施同样措施。

习近平主席还提到不久前中共二十届四中全会通过了“十五五”规划建议，中国将继续扩大高水平对外开放。他强调中国对外开放的大门不会关闭，只会越开越大。

除了核心讲话内容外，还有一些背景信息：这次会议在韩国庆州举行，由韩国总统李在明主持；习近平主席是10月30日至11月1日对韩国进行国事访问并出席会议；会议期间他还与美国总统特朗普举行了会晤。

在整理这些信息时，我特别注意引用来自权威媒体账号的优质搜索结果，确保信息的准确性和时效性。搜索结果中还有一些关于APEC工商领导人峰会的内容，如BTS成员RM的演讲和美国总统特朗普的发言，但这些与用户查询的“重要讲话”核心关联度不高，因此没有包含在重点整理内容中。


中国国家主席习近平于2025年10月31日在韩国庆州举行的亚太经合组织（APEC）第三十二次领导人非正式会议第一阶段会议上发表题为《共建普惠包容的开放型亚太经济》的重要讲话。讲话核心内容如下：```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 1, "data": {"num": [1, 4, 24, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227752525663249", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756406443312", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756721800582", "index": 24, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753955918868", "index": 28, "label": ""}], "name": "央视新闻", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/002TLsr9ly8i653ifvwbtj60j60j6aai02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761898758&ssig=iEwuUdUMCx", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227752525663249", "vType": 3}}```
新华网

### **一、亚太合作面临的挑战与主张**
- **背景分析**：习近平指出，当前世界百年变局加速演进，国际形势变乱交织，亚太地区面临不稳定不确定因素增多。他呼吁各方坚守APEC促进经济增长、增进人民福祉的初衷，坚持开放发展、实现共赢，推进普惠包容的经济全球化，构建亚太共同体。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 3, "data": {"num": [1, 4, 24], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756406443312", "index": 4, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227752525663249", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756721800582", "index": 24, "label": ""}], "name": "新华社", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.58.61.875.875.50/001R0E0aly8h8vg6xx3srj60rs0rsdko02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761898758&ssig=OtagBXHdVv", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756406443312", "vType": 3}}```
- **合作原则**：强调“越是风高浪急，越要同舟共济”，提出以真正的多边主义应对全球挑战。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [1, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "俄罗斯卫星通讯社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227758143410521", "index": 30, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227752525663249", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "俄罗斯卫星通讯社", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/002nDL4Sly8i1ey06r7jnj60go0go0sv02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761898758&ssig=5fk6mcUPlx", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227758143410521", "vType": 3}}```
### **二、五点具体建议**
1. **维护多边贸易体制**
- 践行多边主义，提高世界贸易组织（WTO）权威性，推动国际经贸规则与时俱进，保障发展中国家权益。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 4, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753955918868", "index": 28, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227752525663249", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753827992317", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756406443312", "index": 4, "label": ""}], "name": "人民日报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1018.1018.50/0033ImPzly8h8vgemh8kxj60sa0sadgw02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761898758&ssig=6PuQERPSZs", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753955918868", "vType": 3}}```
2. **营造开放型区域经济环境**
- 推进贸易投资自由化便利化，深化财金合作，把握《区域全面经济伙伴关系协定》（RCEP）和《全面与进步跨太平洋伙伴关系协定》（CPTPP）机遇，推动区域经济一体化。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 4], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227752525663249", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753827992317", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756406443312", "index": 4, "label": ""}]}}```
3. **维护产业链供应链稳定**
- 坚持“拉手而不是松手，延链而不是断链”，以《亚太经合组织互联互通蓝图》实施10周年为契机，加强基础设施、政策规则和人文交流的“硬联通、软联通、心联通”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 4, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227752525663249", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753827992317", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756406443312", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "俄罗斯卫星通讯社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227758143410521", "index": 30, "label": ""}]}}```
4. **推进贸易数字化绿色化**
- 发挥数字技术对跨境贸易的促进作用，破除绿色壁垒，拓展绿色产业、清洁能源合作。中方主导的亚太示范电子口岸网络和绿色供应链网络已成为重要平台。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 4, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "国际在线", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227767546512851", "index": 31, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227752525663249", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753827992317", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756406443312", "index": 4, "label": ""}], "name": "国际在线", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.205.205.50/001Nnd9xly8h8vhyy9o25j605p05pq2r02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761898758&ssig=xg792PggV6", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227767546512851", "vType": 3}}```
5. **促进普惠包容发展**
- 坚持以人民为中心，解决发展不平衡问题。中方将落实对非洲建交国100%税目产品零关税措施，支持高质量共建“一带一路”，为全球发展开辟新空间。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [1, 4, 25, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "今日俄罗斯RT", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227777986922922", "index": 25, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227752525663249", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756406443312", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753955918868", "index": 28, "label": ""}], "name": "今日俄罗斯RT", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/006OBvBvly8i1krmv9iq6j30go0goglu.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761898758&ssig=Jk9u6B5EfD", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227777986922922", "vType": 3}}```
### **三、中国对外开放的实践与承诺**
- **成就数据**：过去5年，中国货物和服务贸易规模居全球第一、第二，累计吸引外资超7000亿美元，对外投资年均增速超5%。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [28, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753955918868", "index": 28, "label": ""}, {"name": "国际在线", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227767546512851", "index": 31, "label": ""}]}}```
- **未来行动**：
- 外资准入负面清单持续缩减，22个自贸试验区对接国际高标准规则。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [28, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753955918868", "index": 28, "label": ""}, {"name": "国际在线", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227767546512851", "index": 31, "label": ""}]}}```
- 以中共二十届四中全会“十五五”规划建议为契机，深化改革开放，以中国式现代化为亚太和世界提供新机遇。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [1, 28, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227752525663249", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753955918868", "index": 28, "label": ""}, {"name": "国际在线", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227767546512851", "index": 31, "label": ""}]}}```
- 重申“中国对外开放的大门不会关闭，只会越开越大”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [28, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227753955918868", "index": 28, "label": ""}, {"name": "国际在线", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227767546512851", "index": 31, "label": ""}]}}```
### **四、会议背景与意义**
- 本次会议主题为“建设可持续的明天”，由韩国总统李在明主持。习近平此行是中共二十届四中全会后首次出访，凸显中国对亚太合作的高度重视。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [4, 5, 24, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "环球时报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227235276758944", "index": 5, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756406443312", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756721800582", "index": 24, "label": ""}, {"name": "外交部发言人办公室", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225387829494401", "index": 27, "label": ""}], "name": "环球时报", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/0029D7FZly8h8vg4kqwr4j60go0got9i02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761898758&ssig=8zxqJtstR3", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227235276758944", "vType": 3}}```
- 中国将于2026年第三次担任APEC东道主，各方期待中国继续引领区域合作。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [5, 22, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "外交部发言人办公室", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5102150332712513", "index": 22, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "环球时报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227235276758944", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "中国日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227198078258464", "index": 26, "label": ""}], "name": "外交部发言人办公室", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.534.534.50/007Kss1jly8gdgmtev8d5j30eu0eujs4.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761898758&ssig=cXwkKgayOz", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5102150332712513", "vType": 1}}```

此次讲话系统阐述了中国对亚太经济一体化的主张，强调开放包容、互利共赢的核心立场，为应对全球性挑战提供了“中国方案”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 25, "data": {"num": [1, 4, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227752525663249", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227756406443312", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "俄罗斯卫星通讯社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227758143410521", "index": 30, "label": ""}]}}```
外交部发言人办公室
中国日报
